page.title: 13THE FARMING YEAR
page.content: JAN Snow clearing,Stock feeding, Farm and Machinery maintenance FEB As above,Top-dress Cereals MAR Drill Spring barley.Spray weeds in cereals. Prepare for lambing APR Lambing. Spray for corn diseases Dairy herd out to grass. MAY Silage making.Top-dress cereals. Sheep-shearing. JUN Hay making.Fallow grass leys. JUL Harvest winter barleys. Drill turnips in burnt stubbles. AUG Main harvest. Combine cereals. Bale straw,cart and stack. Cultivate burnt stubbles. SEP Harvest Spring Rape.Drill barley. OCT Drill wheat.Cows into yards. Pre and post emergence spraying for weed control in cereals. NOV Shooting season.Trim hedges,mend fences,plough for spring crops. DEC Stock feeding and maintenance.
